name: The Sword of Camelot
overview: Sword Of Camelot is a Puzzle game, developed by The Code Monkeys and published by Midas Interactive Entertainment, which was released in Europe in 2001 Can Arthur and the Knights save the Kingdom? As well as a great half-hour video, Camelot features easy-to-use virtual coloring book and a challenging puzzle game. Features Arthur, King of Camelot and Queen Guinevere face a terrible challenge when the evil Mordred attacks cartoon video easy-to-use virtual colouring book challenging puzzle game 1 Player
